title: The Most Rewarding Champs to Learn For Every Role

replies.body:
Top gnar 
Jung mumu
Adc quinn
Mid karthus
Support shen
Amumu isn't hard. You just Q into teamfights and use all your abilities.
I knew it was coming. I didn't know it would be this fast, but I knew it was coming.
The {{champion:67}} or the 5 in a row?
